s.text: The Internet economy is a more contemporary example of this phenomenon: Surely most people trying to strike it rich in this gold rush will fail, but right now their buoyant optimism is keeping the stock market high and making America wealthier.

In the fourth, they were given another logical-reasoning test, but this time some of those tested were subsequently given about 10 minutes' worth of training in logical reasoning and then asked to re-estimate how well they'd done on the test.
